titleStmt.title: Two petitions of the Lord Major, aldermen, and Common-Councell of the City of London: concerning Major Generall Skippon. With the Parliaments answer thereunto. Also, the declaration of the Committee of Estates of the Parliament of Scotland, or the five reasons of their armies comming into England. And the last newes from the Prince of Wales, and the Duke of York.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

titleStmt.title: Two petitions of the Lord Major, aldermen, and Common-Councell of the City of London: concerning Major Generall Skippon. With the Parliaments answer thereunto. Also, the declaration of the Committee of Estates of the Parliament of Scotland, or the five reasons of their armies comming into England. And the last newes from the Prince of Wales, and the Duke of York.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament.
Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for G. Beal, and are to be sold in the Old-Bayley, and neer Temple Bar,

notesStmt.note: Includes an extract of: Scotland, Parliament. A declaration of the Committee of Estates concerning their proceedings in opposition to the late unlawfull engagement against England.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
